00011 namespace CALICE {

00013   // generate instances of static object
00014   std::map<std::string, MappedContainer<CellNeighbours>*> CellNeighboursProcessor::_cellNeighboursContainerMap;
00015   std::map<std::string, std::string > CellNeighboursProcessor::_cellNeighboursEncodingStringMap;
00016 
00017   MappedContainer<CellNeighbours>* CellNeighboursProcessor::getNeighbours(const std::string& processorName) {
00018     return _cellNeighboursContainerMap[processorName];
00019   }
00020 
00021   const std::string& CellNeighboursProcessor::getEncodingString(const std::string& processorName) {
00022     return _cellNeighboursEncodingStringMap[processorName];
00023   }
00024 
00025   CellNeighboursProcessor::CellNeighboursProcessor() : Processor("CellNeighboursProcessor") {
00026 
00027     _description = "Processor that provides a MappedContainer of CellNeighbours objects";
00028 
00029     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00030                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides the geometry of the detector." ,
00031                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00032                                 std::string("MyMappingProcessor") ) ;
00033 
00034   }
00035 
00036   void CellNeighboursProcessor::init() {
00037 
00038     // usually a good idea
00039     printParameters();
00040 
00041     std::stringstream message;
00042     bool error=false;
00043 
00044     _mapper = MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName);
00045 
00046     if ( ! _mapper ) {
00047 
00048       message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00049       error = true;
00050     }
00051 
00052     if (error) {
00053       streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00054       throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00055     }
00056 
00057     _cellNeighboursContainerMap[name()] = new MappedContainer<CellNeighbours>(_mapper);
00058     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00059     generateNeighbours();
00060 
00061   }
00062 
00063   void CellNeighboursProcessor::generateNeighbours() {
00064     CellNeighbourCalculator calculator(_mapper);
00065     calculator.getNeighbours(_cellNeighboursContainerMap[name()]);
00066     _cellNeighboursEncodingStringMap[name()] = _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding();
00067   }
00068 
00069   void CellNeighboursProcessor::processEvent( LCEvent *evt ) {
00070     if (_mapper->getVersion() != _mapperVersion ) {
00071       generateNeighbours();
00072       _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076   void CellNeighboursProcessor::end() {
00077     delete _cellNeighboursContainerMap[name()];
00078     _cellNeighboursContainerMap.erase(name());
00079   }
00080 
00081   /* create instance to make processor known to Marlin
00082    * should be very last thing to do, to prevent order problems during
00083    * deletion of static objects.
00084    */
00085   CellNeighboursProcessor aCellNeighboursProcessor;
00086 
00087 } // end namespace CALICE
